title: 4 Hours of The Best Epic Inspirational Music
description: My new 6 Hour Epic Inspirational music compilation is UP!!! Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5N8sU... This video features 1 hour and 50 minutes of new epic inspirational music, then 2 hours more of the rest! Click "Show More" for the entire song list! 95) The Secret OST - Wheel of Misfortune 0:00:00 94) Hans Zimmer - An Ideal of Hope 0:00:22 93) James Horner - Becoming One Of The People 0:02:43 92) Audiomachine -
